about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the shared-object libraries needed to run
applications that use the LAL Burst library.  If you want to install
the Python bindings, please install the associated python-lalburst
package.

The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: lalburst
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "lalburst" %}
{% set version = "1.5.3" %}
{% set sha256 = "871b9e88df537ec55dc6d47e50714970723b9f7f8b4fbef61a82c04db644559c" %}

# dependencies
{% set lal_version = "6.21.0" %}
{% set lalmetaio_version = "1.6.0" %}
{% set lalsimulation_version = "1.10.0" %}
{% set swig_version = "3.0.7" %}


package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.xz"
  sha256: "{{ sha256 }}"

build:
  error_overdepending: true
  error_overlinking: true
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - make
    - pkg-config >=0.18.0
    - swig >={{ swig_version }}
  host:
    - gsl
    - lal >={{ lal_version }}
    - lalmetaio >={{ lalmetaio_version }}
    - lalsimulation >={{ lalsimulation_version }}
    - metaio
  run:
    - gsl
    - lal >={{ lal_version }}
    - lalmetaio >={{ lalmetaio_version }}
    - lalsimulation >={{ lalsimulation_version }}
    - metaio

test:
  requires:
    - pkg-config  # [unix]
  commands:
    - lalburst_version --verbose
    - test "$(pkg-config --modversion ${PKG_NAME})" == "${PKG_VERSION}"  # [unix]

outputs:
  - name: lalburst
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("lalburst", max_pin="x.x") }}

  - name: python-lalburst
    script: install-python.sh
    build:
      error_overdepending: true
      error_overlinking: true
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - make
        - pkg-config >=0.18.0
        - swig >={{ swig_version }}
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('lalburst', exact=True) }}
        - numpy
        - python
      run:
        - gsl
        - lal >={{ lal_version }}
        - lalmetaio  # [linux]
        - lalsimulation  # [linux]
        - {{ pin_subpackage('lalburst', exact=True) }}
        - ligo-segments
        - lscsoft-glue
        - matplotlib-base
        - metaio  # [linux]
        - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
        - python
        - python-lal >={{ lal_version }}
        - python-lalmetaio >={{ lalmetaio_version }}
        - python-lalsimulation >={{ lalsimulation_version }}
        - python-ligo-lw
        - scipy
    test:
      imports:
        - lalburst
        - lalburst.SimBurstUtils
        - lalburst.SnglBurstUtils
        - lalburst.binjfind
        - lalburst.bucluster
        - lalburst.burca
        - lalburst.burca_tailor
        - lalburst.cafe
        - lalburst.calc_likelihood
        - lalburst.cs_gamma
        - lalburst.date
        - lalburst.offsetvector
        - lalburst.packing
        - lalburst.snglcluster
        - lalburst.snglcoinc
        - lalburst.stringutils
        - lalburst.timeslides
      requires:
        - mock  # [py<33]
        - pathlib  # [py<34]
        - pytest >=4.0.0a0
      source_files:
        - test/python
      commands:
        - pushd test/python; python -m pytest -v; popd
    about:
      home: "https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite"
      doc_url: "https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalburst/"
      dev_url: "https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/"
      license: "GPL-3.0-or-later"
      license_family: "GPL"
      license_file: "COPYING"
      summary: "LSC Algorithm Burst Library"
      description: |
        The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
        This package contains the python bindings.

about:
  home: "https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite"
  doc_url: "https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalburst/"
  dev_url: "https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/"
  license: "GPL-3.0-or-later"
  license_family: "GPL"
  license_file: "COPYING"
  summary: "LSC Algorithm Burst Library"
  description: |
    The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
    This package contains the shared-object libraries needed to run
    applications that use the LAL Burst library.  If you want to install
    the Python bindings, please install the associated python-lalburst
    package.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo
